name: Zaibot
description:
Zaibot, the protagonist who is seeking answers after a mysterious wipe out in a cyberpunk city.

Features -

▸ 4 characters with different traits each.

▸ 4 maps to be explored.

▸ Each map has 3 separate paths for various characters.

▸ Collect points and find clues while exploring.

▸ Dark and mysterious environment.

▸ Great cyberpunk soundtracks.

• 11th Place Winner in BuildBox's Cyberpunk GameJam 2019 •

A little free game I made, only available in the AppStores.

Developed in  30 days as a solo dev without writing a single line of code!

Feel free to drop any feedbacks or what you think about the game! It is very much appreciated! Thanks!
